title: AT&T Stock Is Rising Because a Good Deal Trumps Mixed Earnings
text:
AT&T and Elliott Management have made good—and that has outweighed a mixed third-quarter earnings report.

On Monday morning, the media and telecommunications giant revealed a three-year plan on items including capital allocation, cost reduction, and earnings and profit margin guidance above Wall Street’s expectations. It also committed to not making any major acquisitions in the next three years, and to certain leadership tweaks. AT&T stock (ticker: T) rose close to 2% in premarket trading Monday.
